tenets.name: Holy Training
events: +50% materials from tribute chests for 1 mission

tenets.name: Offer Gold
events: +1 might, +1 tribute chest for one mission

tenets.name: Study Scriptures
events: +50% offerings from tribute chests for 1 mission

tenets.name: Dark Dedication
events: +100% materials from tribute chests for 2 missions
-50% offerings from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Approve Appropriation
events: +50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Arranged Marriages
events: +2 knowledge, +100% materials from tribute chests for 1 mission

tenets.name: Order of Priests
events: -50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Peaceful Protests
events: +50% offerings from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Stern Sermons
events: +50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Code of Honor
events: +50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Rain Deity
events: -50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

tenets.name: Sun Deity
events: -50% offerings from tribute chests for 1 mission

tenets.name: Zero Commitment
events: -25% materials from tribute chests for one mission

traditions.name: Generosity
effect: Starting rituals: Charisma, Devotion, Knowledge, Health.
Class: Cook (Nature, Charisma & Knowledge)
Fire Heart (Relic): 50% charisma to physical armor. Unlocks Zealot (Divine) and Songsmith (Life).
Godly Recipe (Relic): 100% knowledge to faith (up to 100). Unlocks Druid (Nature) and Harbinger (Dark).
traditions.comment: Shares Worship Cats with Pleasure and Madness. Shares Joyful Sermons with Peace and Pleasure.

traditions.name: Peace
effect: Starting rituals: Charisma, Devotion, Knowledge, Health.
Class: Ambassador (Ancestral, Charisma & Devotion)
Halo (Relic): +1 xp per mission per 20 points of morale armor. Unlocks Druid (Nature) and Zealot (Divine)
The First Word (Relic): 50% of charisma to initiative. Unlocks Weaver (Dark) and Songsmith (Life)
traditions.comment: Shares Joyful Sermons with Generosity and Pleasure.
events: -50% offerings from tribute chests for one mission

traditions.name: War
effect: Starting rituals: Might, Health, Cunning, Devotion.
Class: Executioner (Dark, Might & Health)
Voice Thresher (Relic): Might abilities give the opponent a chance to stumble on their words and lose converts. Unlocks Beast Walker (Nature) and Chieftain (Ancestral).
Eternal Shield (Relic): Abilities gain +1 evasion scaling. Unlocks Guardian (Life) and Rage Prophet (Ancestral).
traditions.comment: Shares Official Greeting with Greed. Shares No Pain, No Gain with Purity.
events: -50% materials from tribute chests for 1 mission

traditions.name: Purity
effect: Starting rituals: Might, Health, Devotion, Knowledge.
Class: Ascetic (Divine, Health & Devotion)
Holy Water (Relic): In the third round, one of your disciples uses an AoE morale ability that scales with the devotion of the entire team. Unlocks Druid (Nature) and Zealot (Divine).
Cleansing Apple (Relic): 50% of health to defy. Unlocks Guardian (Life) and Harbinger (Dark).
traditions.comment: Shares Stern Sermons with Madness. Shares No Pain, No Gain with War.

traditions.name: Greed
effect: Starting rituals: Might, Cunning, Devotion, Knowledge.
Class: Charlatan (Life, Cunning & Knowledge)
Golden Mask (Relic): Cunning abilities have +20 accuracy and deal +100% damage on crits. Unlocks Beastwalker (Nature) and Guardian (Life).
Idol of Greed (Relic): +1 ability point when knowledge goes rank up (not F to E). Unlocks Weaver (Dark) and Druid (Nature)
traditions.comment: Shares Meal Prayer with Madness. Shares Official Greeting with War.
events: -25% on all mental stats for one mission, temporary -10 faith
-50% offerings from tribute chests for one mission
-50% materials from tribute chests for one mission

traditions.name: Pleasure
effect: Starting rituals: Charisma, Devotion, Knowledge, Health.
Class: Lust Priest (Nature, Charisma & Cunning)
Anklet of Joy (Relic): Abilities gain +1 Evasion scaling. Unlocks Beastwalker (Nature) and Songsmith (Life).
Holy Rose (Relic): Charisma abilities have 33% chance to Infatuate target for 2 rounds. Unlocks Weaver (Dark) and Chieftain (Ancestral).
traditions.comment: Shares Worship Cats with Generosity and Madness. Shares Joyful Sermons with Generosity and Peace.

traditions.name: Madness
effect: Starting rituals: Charisma, Devotion, Knowledge, Health.
Class: Cultist (Dark, Might & Knowledge).
Sacred Infant (Relic): 50% of Might to crit chances. Unlocks Beast Walker (Nature) and Chieftain (Ancestral).
Secret Pyramid (Relic): Knowledge abilities make enemies Mad for 2 rounds, increasing chance to intercept badly and 1 Clouded Thought. Unlocks Weaver (Dark) and Druid (Nature).
traditions.comment: Shares Worship Cats with Generosity and Pleasure. Shares Stern Sermons with Purity. Shares Meal Prayer with Greed.

traditions.name: Brainwashing
effect: Passive: Gain 1/2 extra tribute chests if disciples have 3/8 overpower abilities.
Action: Brainwash. Cost 200 (increases), cooldown 6, Gain 2 extra tribute chests next mission. All future disciplines gain +5 faith and -2 knowledge

traditions.name: Human Sacrifice
effect: Action: Choose Master of Sacrifice. Cost 100. Can learn morale Ancestral ability that scales on might and lowers physical armor (Fear).
Action: Human Sacrifice. Cost: 50, cooldown 4. If participating: +1/2/4 Tribute Chests if you have 1/3/6 Ancestral and Divine disciples.

traditions.name: Grand Abberation
effect: Action: Choose Grand Summoner. Cost 0. Can learn Nature physical AoE that scales on might and has a chance to stun (Overpower, Sorcery).
Action: The Great Summoning. Cost 50, cooldown 4. If participating, +1/2/4 Tribute Chests if you have 1/3/6 Dark and Nature disciples.

traditions.name: Community Elder
effect: Action: Assign Community Elder. Cost 0. If participating +1 Tribute Chest, and +1 Tribute Chest if highest Charisma or Knowledge. -5 Faith each mission.
Action: Community Meeting. Cost 0, cooldown 4. All disciples +10 Morale Armor for 1 mission. +1 Happiness

traditions.name: Carnival
effect: Action: Carnival. Cost 200, cooldown 4. 3 random disciples develop 1x Charisma, but can also gain temporary debuff. +1 Happiness. -2 Faith

traditions.name: Turn the Other Cheek
effect: Passive: All physical abilities that convert by something other than Grace get replaced by Devout(++), a moral ability that scales by Devotion.
Action: Glory of Grace. Cost 50, cooldown 4. +1/2/3/4 Tribute Chests if you start the next mission with 0/3/7/12 Grace abilities.

traditions.name: Might Makes Right
effect: Passive: Disciple with highest might gains 40 faith. 3 disciples with lowest might lose 2 faith.
Action: Impose right. Cost 0, cooldown 4. Disciple with highest might gains +3 tribute chests for next mission. Weakest 3 disciples gain -3 faith.

traditions.name: God of Thieves
effect: Action: Steal chests. Cost 25, cooldown 2. Choose a disciple. Unavailable for 1 mission and loses 1 fervor. +1/2/4 Tribute chests if disciple has rank D/C/A Cunning.

traditions.name: Monastery of Miracles
effect: Passive: All Sorcery abilities give the target -15 Accuracy for two rounds.
Action: Humbling Augury. Cost 25, cooldown 1. Target disciple with lowest power. +5 Faith. If participating, +1 Tribute Chest. Cannot receive Broken Faith status and do not lose converts when broken.

traditions.name: Cult of Silence
effect: Passive: All Dark and Divine disciples can learn Silence: Dark morale ability that disables opponents morale abilities. Scales on Might and knowledge (Fear).
Action: Enforce Silence. Cost 150, cooldown 3. Choose a disciple to gain Silence++ for 1 mission. For 1 mission, gain +1/2/3/4 Spark if disciples have 3/6/10/15 Fear abilities on their mind.

traditions.name: Idol
effect: Action: Assign Idol. Choose Idol. If participating, +50% charisma materials from tribute chests. -5 Faith. Can learn strong AoE Life Morale ability that can infatuate targets.
Action: Please Fans. Cost 25, cooldown 4. If Idol participates, +2 tribute chests for 1 mission. -5 Faith.

traditions.name: Champion of God
effect: Action: Assign champion. Choose Champion of God. If participating, +50% health materials from tribute chests. Can learn Life physical ability that steals converts.
Action: Rally Troops. Cost 100, cooldown 3. +1 tribute chest for next mission. All disciples boost to physical and moral armor

traditions.name: War Slaves
effect: Passive: -1 Happiness, +1 Tribute Chest from repeatables.
Action: Double Shifts. Cost 0, cooldown 3. +100% materials from tribute chests for 1 mission if it's repeatable. -2 Faith for all disciples.

traditions.name: Holy Judge
effect: Action: Assign Holy Judge. Cost 0. Can learn Ancestral morale ability that disables physical abilities. Scales on devotion (Reason, Grace).

Action: Holy Trial. Cost 100, cooldown 3. Judge another disciple. +1 Tribute Chest for 1 mission. +1 Tribute Chest for 1 mission per 2 Reason abilities on the Holy Judge's mind. Judged disciple gains 2 Clouded Thoughts for 2 missions.

traditions.name: Animism
effect: Passive: Nature and Life disciples +20 Faith.
Action: Commune with Spirits. Cost 50, cooldown 3. Next mission +20% stats if Nature disciple in team. +2 Fervor. If participating: +50% Offering from Tribute Chests for 1 mission.

traditions.name: Baptism
effect: Action: Baptize. Cost 0, cooldown 3. Baptize a disciple. +25 Faith and regain all Fervor. Develop 2x devotion. +100% offerings from tribute chests for 1 mission.
Each disciple can only be baptized once.

traditions.name: Revelations
effect: Action: Revelation. Cost 75, cooldown 1. Reveal yourself to one disciple who gains progress current ritual x8 and 2 years of age.
Action: Final Revelation. Cost ?, cooldown ?. Let an Elder Disciple die. Gain +1/2/4 spark if disciple has rank F/C/A Devotion.

traditions.name: Hermit Pilgrimage
effect: Action: Hermit Pilgrimage. Cost 100, cooldown 1. Choose a disciple with at least X knowledge (X based on island). Disciple will gain: Unavailable for 1 mission, 8 xp, 2 ability points.

traditions.name: Just New World
effect: Action: Declare Revolution. Cost 250, cooldown 6. All disciples complete their current ritual. All disciples gain boosted moracle and physical damage for 1 mission. +100% materials from Tribute Chests for 1 mission.

traditions.name: Burials
effect: Passive: When disciple dies, next mission +1/3/7 tribute chests if rank C/B/A Health.
Action: Ceremonial Burial. Cost 150, cooldown 4. Hold a burial (no deaths needed). All disciples develop x1 Health. Temporary -2 happiness

traditions.name: Heavenly Art
effect: Action: Choose Heavenly Sculptor. Can learn strong Life morale ability that scales on Charisma and Knowledge and lowers opponents morale damage (Grace).
Action: Inspire Great Art. Cost 200, cooldown 3. Upgrade all future disciples' base stats by 1. Talk more about art for 1 mission. Attract new followers depending on knowledge.

traditions.name: School of Philosophy
effect: Action: Send to School. Cost 100, cooldown 3. Disciple unavailable for 1 mission. Develop 1x Knowledge, gain 4 xp, and learn an ability (Preferred: Reason)

traditions.name: Ecstatic Salvation
effect: Action: Grant Ecstacy. Cost 100, cooldown 3. Disciple gains develop 2x Cunning. If participating +50% cunning materials from tribute chests in 1 mission. +10 Faith

traditions.name: Cannibalism
effect: Action: Cannibal Meal. Cost 0, cooldown 2. Disciple gains 1x Might, Health and Cunning development. -10 Faith

traditions.name: Holy Marriage
effect: Action: Holy Marriage. Choose a Holy Spouse. He/she gains if participating +25% devotion offerings from tribute chests.
Action: Holy Procession. Cost 100, cooldown 3. Holy Spouse gains develop 1 devotion and 0.25 other stats. -10 Faith.

traditions.name: Doom Prophecy
effect: Action: Doom Prophecy. Cost 0, cooldown 3. Choose disciple. Develop 0.5 Charisma & 0.5 Knowledge. One Mad thought for 1 mission. If participating +100% knowledge offerings from tribute chests

traditions.name: Trade Missions
effect: Action: Trade Mission. Cost 150, cooldown 5. Send a disciple. Unavailable for 2 missions. Permanently add +5/10/20 Passive materials income if disciple has D/B/A knowledge rank. All disciples develop 1x knowledge.

traditions.name: Bribery
effect: Action: Bribe. Cost 0, cooldown 1. Choose disciple. Develops 2x Might. +20 Faith. -1 Happiness

traditions.name: Alchemy
effect: Action: Choose an Alchemist. +1 Knowledge scaling on all physical abilities. Will sometimes use Concoction which heals allies based on Knowledge and raises Might and another random physical stat.
Action: Perform Alchemy. Cost 100, cooldown 3 days (practically 1 mission). Turn 100 Offerings into 50/70/90 Materials if alchemist has Knowledge rank F/C/A

traditions.name: Martial Arts
effect: Passive: All overpower abilities lower all opponent's physical armor with 50% for 1 round.
Action: Bless fists. Cost 100, cooldown 3. Choose a disciple. If participating: +100% Might Offerings from Tribute chests. Chance to follow up ally's physical ability if turn is NOT yet taken.

traditions.name: Reincarnation
effect: Action: Reincarnate the First Prophet. Choose a disciple with an advanced class who can still gain a miracle. Enough XP to gain a level. A powerful Prophet Miracle. +15 Faith.
Action: Stories from the past. Cost 100, cooldown 3. If Prophet (Reincarnate) participates: +1 Tribute chest. +1 Tribute chest if highest Might or Charisma. +5 citizens per power

classes.name: Harbinger
classes.de_buffs: +30 Morale Accuracy, +30 Physical Accuracy, -10 Morale Armor

passives.name: Heavy Aura
passives.effect: -10 Morale armor for all opponents (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Weakening Aura
passives.effect: -25% might for all opponents.

passives.name: Channel Negativity
passives.effect: +5% charisma and might per debuff the opponent has.

passives.name: Dark Guardian
passives.effect: Significantly increases the chance to intercept physical. Gain resistance vs Dark.

passives.name: Break & Berate
passives.effect: Always follow up another ally's Reason ability.

passives.name: Reaper
passives.effect: +20% might and health every time another ally uses a Fear ability.

abilities.name: Demoralize
abilities.effect: Lesser morale ability that lowers morale armor

abilities.name: Mortify
abilities.effect: Morale ability that has a chance to Fear

abilities.name: Shattering Spell
abilities.effect: Physical ability

classes.name: Guardian

passives.name: Great Defender

passives.name: Force of God
passives.effect: +50% Base physical power.

passives.name: Spiked Shield
passives.effect: Chance to counter a physical attack. Counter-attack scales with Health.

passives.name: Juggernaut
passives.effect: +20% might and cunning every time another ally uses an overpower ability.

passives.name: Mountain of Life
passives.effect: +30% Health. Resistance vs Dark.

abilities.name: Wall
abilities.effect: Self-heal, increase physical armor and the chance to intercept physical for one turn.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.effect: Lesser physical ability, but has a chance to stun.

abilities.name: Life Strike

classes.name: Rage Prophet
classes.de_buffs: +50% HP, increased optimal targeting, -10 morale armor.

passives.name: Rage
passives.effect: Gain +25% damage boost after being hit by a physical attack.

passives.name: Sorcerer's Knight
passives.effect: +1 might for each 5 knowledge in your team before start.

passives.name: Revenge
passives.effect: Chance to counter a physical attack. Counter-attack scales with Health.

passives.name: Wild Eye
passives.effect: 25% of might added to critical hit chance.

passives.name: Magic Strike
passives.effect: +25% damage every time another ally uses a sorcery ability.

passives.name: Avatar of Strife
passives.effect: Resistance vs Life. Chance to follow up enemy Life abilities.

abilities.name: Concussion
abilities.effect: An elementless physical ability with a chance to stun the target.

abilities.name: Blind Rage
abilities.effect: Random power ancestral physical ability that targets a random opponent with reduced chance to hit.

abilities.name: Ancestral Strike

passives.name: Swift Hunter
passives.effect: +25 crit chance and +25 evasion on first 2 turns.

passives.name: Counterslash
passives.effect: Counter whenever an ally Evades a physical attack

passives.name: Prowlers
passives.effect: Allied abilities gain +Evasion scaling for damage (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: God-Hunter
passives.effect: Chance to Follow up enemy divine abilities.

passives.name: Swift Judgement
passives.effect: Extra Move on your first turn.

passives.name: God Steps
passives.effect: +20% might and cunning every time another ally uses a Grace ability.

abilities.name: Invisible Prowl
abilities.effect: A lesser nature physical ability that increases the evasion of your allies.

abilities.name: Agile Claw
abilities.effect: A nature physical ability with increased chance to hit.

abilities.name: Critical Claw
abilities.effect: A nature physical ability with increased chance to crit.

classes.name: Smitesword
classes.de_buffs: +10 morale armor, increased intercept morale, -10 initiative

passives.name: Counter Heresy
passives.effect: Chance to counter a morale attack. Counter scales with Might.

passives.name: Witch Hunter
passives.effect: +25% might and devotion if there is an enemy Dark disciple.

passives.name: Sword of Faith
passives.effect: The smitesword's abilities gain might scaling.

passives.name: Great Challenger
passives.effect: Convert based on Devotion when intercept morale.

passives.name: Fist of God
passives.effect: +25% might whenever another ally uses an overpower ability.

passives.name: Destined
passives.effect: +10% crit chance and +25% crit damage every time another ally uses a grace ability.

abilities.name: Challenge Heresy
abilities.effect: A divine morale ability that improves morale armor and the chance to intercept morale.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.effect: A divine physical ability. Lowers the target's knowledge.

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.effect: A potent divine physical ability that scales on both might and devotion.

passives.name: Leader of God
passives.effect: Inspire a random other ally after using a Fear, Grace or Overpower ability. Inspired ally gains +25% might and health.

passives.name: Bodyguards
passives.effect: +10 physical armor and increased chance to intercept physical for other allies.

passives.name: Wild Envoy
passives.effect: Start with an extra turn if there is a Nature disciple on your side.

passives.name: Courage
passives.effect: Allied abilities gain might scaling for damage (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Commander
passives.effect: +25% charisma every time another ally uses an overpower ability.

passives.name: Tyrant
passives.effect: +25% might every time another ally uses a fear ability.

abilities.name: Mighty Rally
abilities.effect: An ancestral morale ability that targets all opponents and raises your team's might and charisma.

abilities.name: Totem Slam
abilities.effect: A powerful ancestral physical ability.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.effect: A powerful ancestral morale ability.

passives.name: Punish the Feeble
passives.effect: Counter Clouded actions.

passives.name: Power Word
passives.effect: +25% base morale power.

passives.name: Dazing Doom
passives.effect: Nightmare and Doom daze for 1 turn.

passives.name: Foresight
passives.effect: Gain +50% of knowledge to initiative.

passives.name: Dreamweaver
passives.effect: +20% charisma and knowledge every time another ally uses a sorcery ability.

passives.name: Whither
passives.effect: Cast Purple Haze in the first turn if there is an enemy nature disciple. Purple Haze deals Dark morale damage and dazes all opponents for one round.

abilities.name: Mind Stare
abilities.effect: Lesser dark morale ability that dazes the mind of the opponent for the whole sacrament.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.effect: Dark morale ability. More likely to hit.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.effect: Dark morale ability with increased chance to crit.

passives.name: Righteousness
passives.effect: Always Follow up when another ally scores a critical hit.

passives.name: Zeal
passives.effect: Allied abilities gain devotion scaling for damage (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Willpower
passives.effect: 40% of devotion added to critical argument chance.

passives.name: Judge Ancestors
passives.effect: Chance to Follow up opponent ancestral abilities.

passives.name: Hell
passives.effect: +10% charisma for all allies whenever another ally uses a fear ability.

passives.name: Forgiveness
passives.effect: +25% devotion every time another ally uses a grace ability.

abilities.name: Blessing
abilities.effect: Lesser divine morale ability that raises the crit chance of all allies.

abilities.name: Castigate
abilities.effect: Divine morale ability.

abilities.name: Question
abilities.effect: Lesser divine morale abilty that dazes the opponent for one round.

classes.name: Druid
classes.de_buffs: +10 morale armor, +25% HP, -10 critical argument chance.

passives.name: Nature's Defiance
passives.effect: +10 morale armor for all allies (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: The Four Truths
passives.effect: Allied morale abilities gain knowledge scaling (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Spell Combo
passives.effect: Chance to Entangle (physical ability) whenever another ally uses a sorcery abilty.

passives.name: Skeptic
passives.effect: Druid's morale abilities gain extra morale armor scaling.

passives.name: Peacekeeper
passives.effect: Heal and convert every time another ally uses a reason ability. Scales on devotion.

passives.name: Serenity
passives.effect: +25% knowledge every turn after the first.

abilities.name: Wisdom
abilities.effect: Lesser nature morale ability that raises user's morale armor and chance to intercept morale for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Marvel of Growth
abilities.effect: A nature morale ability.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: A nature physical ability that leaves the target hampered and unable to use some morale abilities.

classes.name: Songsmith
classes.de_buffs: +10 evasion, +10 crit argument chance, -10 morale armor

passives.name: Melodies
passives.effect: Removes hit chance penalty for AoE abilities.

passives.name: Elegance
passives.effect: Allied abilities gain +cunning scaling for damage (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Song
passives.effect: The songsmith's abilities gain +charisma scaling.

passives.name: Dance of Faith
passives.effect: Follow up with an ally evades a physical attack.

passives.name: Mirage
passives.effect: +25% cunning whenever an ally uses a Sorcery ability.

passives.name: Gloria
passives.effect: +25% charisma whenever an ally uses a Grace ability.

abilities.name: Loud Hymn
abilities.effect: A Life morale ability that targets all opponents and heals your disciples.

abilities.name: Classic Song
abilities.effect: A strong Life morale ability that targets all opponents, but lowers your physical armor.

abilities.name: Performance
abilities.effect: A Life morale ability that raises your team's cunning.

classes.name: Executioner
classes.de_buffs: +25 critical hit chance, increased optimal targeting, -25 evasion.

passives.name: Killer
passives.effect: Will be more likely to target a low health opponent. Can be improved with knowledge.

passives.name: Brutal
passives.effect: +25% base physical power

passives.name: Relentless
passives.effect: Small chance to act twice (only high faith).

passives.name: Bully
passives.effect: Rend and War Reaper remove converted followers.

passives.name: Bloodbath
passives.effect: Chance to Follow up another ally's overpower ability.

passives.name: Avatar of War
passives.effect: Chance to gain +25% might whenever another ally uses a fear ability.

abilities.name: Rend

abilities.name: War Reaper

abilities.name: War Wind
abilities.effect: A Dark physical ability that targets all enemies.

classes.name: Ascetic

passives.effect: Heal all allies in all but the first turn. Scales on Health.

passives.name: Suffering

passives.name: Focus
passives.effect: +10 defy for all allies.

passives.name: Hardened

passives.name: Chastising Vow
passives.effect: +20% health and devotion whenever another ally uses a fear ability.

passives.name: Reproach
passives.effect: Always Follow up whenever an ally defies a morale attack.

abilities.name: Shame

abilities.name: Purify

abilities.name: Purge

passives.name: Aromas
passives.effect: +25 morale accuracy for all allies (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: Good Chief
passives.effect: +10 devotion. Resistance vs Divine

passives.name: Force Feed
passives.effect: Counter with 'Miracle Bounty' when an enemy defies a morale attack.

passives.name: Generous Taste
passives.effect: All allies gain +25% base morale power whenever an ally uses a Grace ability.

passives.name: Lively Feast
passives.effect: Sometimes gain +10% knowledge and charisma whenever another ally uses a Life ability.

abilities.name: Split Meal
abilities.effect: Small heal. Boosts both target's and own morale damage with +25%.

abilities.name: Miracle Bounty
abilities.effect: Potent morale ability, but also gives target +25% physical damage.

abilities.name: Nurse
abilities.effect: A Divine morale ability.

passives.name: Peace for All
passives.effect: Divine Peace and Peace Offer now target all opponents, and gain the corresponding hit and damage penalty.

passives.name: Guild
passives.effect: -15 Physical accuracy for all opponents each turn (stacks 4 times).

passives.name: Penetrating Word

passives.name: Peace Envoy

passives.name: Voice of Reason
passives.effect: +25% knowledge and charisma every time another ally uses a Reason ability.

passives.name: Amazing Grace
passives.effect: Allied Grace abilities gain +2 devotion scaling for damage.

abilities.name: Unity
abilities.effect: Heals disciples and raises their devotion and charisma.

abilities.name: Peace Offer
abilities.effect: An Ancestral morale ability.

abilities.name: Divine Peace
abilities.effect: A Divine morale ability.

passives.name: Heritage Talks
passives.effect: Chance to counter a physical ability with the 'Show-Off Wealth' ability

passives.name: Rob the Fools
passives.effect: -20 physical and morale accuracy to target on a critical hit or argument.

passives.name: Thievery
passives.effect: All abilities steal material equal to 25% of the damage dealt.

passives.name: Greedy Heart
passives.effect: +10 critical hit and argument chance. crits do +25% damage if the charlatan has less than 50% HP left. Resistance vs Dark

passives.name: Con Artist
passives.effect: +20% knowledge and charisma every time another ally uses a Reason ability.

passives.name: Razzle Dazzle
passives.effect: +25% cunning every time another ally uses a Sorcery ability.

abilities.name: Show-Off Heritage

abilities.name: Golden Scepter
abilities.effect: Strong Life physical ability. Scales on both Cunning and Knowledge.

abilities.name: Con
abilities.effect: A Life morale ability that steals materials.

classes.name: Lust Priest

passives.effect: Allied Grace and Sorcery abilities have 25% chance of inflicting Infatuated debuff

passives.name: Flexible
passives.effect: +15 evasion, +15 defy

passives.name: Beguile
passives.effect: Steal converts when an ally Evades a physical attack. Steal is Life and Charisma based.

passives.name: Bacchanalia
passives.effect: In sacrament: +1 charisma and cunning for each 5 charisma in your team before the start of the Sacrament

abilities.name: Alluring Body
abilities.effect: A Nature morale ability that targets all opponents. Scales with both Charisma and Cunning.

abilities.name: Seduce
abilities.effect: A Nature morale ability that inflicts the infatuated debuff

abilities.name: Sensual Touch
abilities.effect: A Life physical ability with higher crit chance.

classes.name: Cultist
classes.de_buffs: +25 crit argument chance, +25 crit hit chance, -10 physical accuracy

passives.name: Corrupt Power
passives.effect: In sacrament: +1 knowledge for each 5 might in your team before the start.

passives.name: Perfect Fodder
passives.effect: In sacrament, all allies gain: 'Cannot receive the Broken Faith status, do not lose converts when broken'.

passives.name: Surge of Might
passives.effect: The cultist's abilities gain Might scaling.

passives.name: Critical Madness
passives.effect: All allies gain +10 crit chance and deal +25% damage from critical hits (same effect does not stack).

passives.name: God of Magic
passives.effect: Sorcery abilities gain double extra Knowledge scaling.

passives.name: Force from the Deep
passives.effect: Gain +25% Might and Knowledge whenever an ally uses an Overpower ability.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.effect: Potent morale ability that scales on both might and knowledge.

abilities.name: Words of Madness
abilities.effect: A Dark morale ability that makes opponent converts doubt back to Neutral.

abilities.name: Abberant Growth
abilities.effect: A Nature physical ability that lowers cunning.
